Uttar Pradesh government on Friday said it will give financial incentives to South Korea's Samsung Electronics to set up a $654.36 million (Rs. 4,825 crores) display factory.

articles.title: India readies for 600 million Covid vaccine doses, to use standard cold storage, electoral rolls for distribution - India Today
articles.description: India will deploy its vast election machinery to deliver 600 million doses of coronavirus vaccines to the most vulnerable people in the next 6-8 months through conventional cold chain systems.

articles.title: Google has a new trick to tackle Covid-19 misinformation - HT Tech
articles.description: Google today announced that it is launching a new feature on Search that will surface a list of authorized vaccines in their location as well as information panels on each individual vaccine when people look up information for Covid-19 vaccines.

articles.author: Anonna Dutt
articles.title: India’s mRNA vaccine candidate advances to human trial phase - Hindustan Times
articles.description: An mRNA vaccine uses a synthetic RNA (genetic material) encoded with instructions to make specific proteins of the Sars-CoV-2 virus so that the body can generate an immune response without getting the disease.
